name: bisect
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to divide something into two, usually equal, parts: The new road will bisect the town.

Add to word list
to divide into two usually equal parts: The new road would bisect a designated historic district.
geometry to divide something into two congruent (= exactly equal) parts bisector noun [ C ] us/ˈbɑɪ·sek·tər, bɑɪˈsek-/
geometry the bisector of an angle/segment
